data.title: County Voter Registration & Election Offices
data.meta_description: Select your county to find contact information for your voter registration and elections office.
data.meta_site_name: SC Votes - South Carolina Election Commission
data.text:
Select your county to find contact information for your voter registration and elections office.

Abbeville

The contact information below is where you send your voter registration form or obtain absentee voting information.

Abbeville County Board of Voter Registration & Elections

Address:

903 West Greenwood Street, Suite 2500

Abbeville, SC 29620

Phone: (864) 366-2400, ext. 53

Fax: (864) 366-5797

Email: Jcoleman@abbevillecountysc.com

Director: Jatavius Coleman
